comment.body:
Sorry, my bad,

I had been on the General tab on the Stealth page so I had not in fact
toggled on *Block 3D Party Authorization Headers*.

With *Block 3D Party Authorization Headers *selected neither of the two
custom rules you sent me resolve the problem…

It’s the same as initially reported.


Message ID: ***@***.***>
>>
>

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it at the moment, but I have added a rule which maybe will fix this issue (filters update should be available in 1-2 hours).
Please manually update filters after about 2 hours and then check if issue still occurs.
